channel.title: 🏢 Australian Institute for Machine Learning on NeurIPS 2024
channel.description: Recent content in 🏢 Australian Institute for Machine Learning on NeurIPS 2024

item.title: Knowledge Composition using Task Vectors with Learned Anisotropic Scaling
item.description: aTLAS: a novel parameter-efficient fine-tuning method using learned anisotropic scaling of task vectors for enhanced knowledge composition and transfer.
